sentence: In early trading on Monday, shares of Travelers Companies topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 3.5%.
Year to date, Travelers Companies registers a 1.3% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Home Depot, trading down 1.8%.
Home Depot is showing a gain of 17.0% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are General Electric, trading down 0.5%, and Dowdupont, trading up 1.9% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
